testcase.name: Json4sSupport should enable marshalling and unmarshalling objects for `DefaultFormats` and `jackson.Serialization`
Json4sSupport should enable marshalling and unmarshalling objects for `DefaultFormats` and `native.Serialization`
Json4sSupport should provide proper error messages for requirement errors
Json4sSupport should fail with NoContentException when unmarshalling empty entities
Json4sSupport should fail with UnsupportedContentTypeException when Content-Type is not `application/json`
Json4sSupport should allow unmarshalling with passed in Content-Types
